definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)

sentences.english: Minimizing information may sound like a sin.
sentences.chinese: 精简信息可能听起来像犯罪。
写作清晰，务必精简，避免赘言。

sentences.english: Several small factories merged into a big one.
sentences.chinese: 公司决定将这几个部门合并，精简人员。

sentences.english: They have to downsize, says Mr Abed .
sentences.chinese: 他们必须厉行精简，阿比德先生说。

sentences.english: These papers can be regarded as 5 series of papers compressed simplify edition.
sentences.chinese: 这篇稿件可以看作是5篇系列论文的压缩精简版。

sentences.english: A method to construct delaminating guides tar database with 2-D condensed index is given.
sentences.chinese: 提出二维精简索引分层导航星库的构造方法。

sentences.english: You absolutely do not have to be a vegetarian to simplify your meals.
sentences.chinese: 你绝对不需要成为一个素食主义者来精简用餐。

sentences.english: As for himself, a good life could be stripped down to its simplest form.
sentences.chinese: 对他来说，美好生活可以精简成最简单的形式。

sentences.english: PK Electric Chain Hoists with perfect modern design are simple in structure.
sentences.chinese: PK型环链电动葫芦优化设计，结构精简。

sentences.english: Making the leading organs at and above the corps level leaner by streamlining the organizational structure.
sentences.chinese: 新经理想精简机构以提高生产效率。

sentences.english: LBJ: Soapy, I've figured out a way to effect a real economy in your department.
sentences.chinese: 我想出一种方法，能真正使你的部门变得精简。

sentences.english: Detach and simplify and you minimize worry.
sentences.chinese: 超脱与精简能够最小化你的担忧。

sentences.english: For pork, the leanest cut is the tenderloin.
sentences.chinese: 对于猪肉而言，最精简的部分是腰部的嫩肉。

sentences.english: English and Chinese bilingual edition, in other languages has been streamlined.
sentences.chinese: 英语和中文双语版，其他语种已被精简。

sentences.english: These are the things you should streamline and optimize.
sentences.chinese: 这些事情你就需要将它们精简优化。

sentences.english: The Loongson processor is based on the MIPS instruction set, the basic commands that a microprocessor understands.
sentences.chinese: 龙芯基于MIPS指令集，属于精简的指令集。

definition: variant of 煩冗|烦冗[fan2 rong3]
many and complicated/mired in minor details
to establish (a unit or department)/staffing structure (excluding temporary and casual staff)
to weave/to plait/to compile/to put together (a lesson plan, budget etc)
to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated
